Description: Pottery lidded bowl with flat base, convex sides, short neck with everted rim, two ribbed lug handles on shoulder, body decorated with buff-coloured slip under purple pigment in continuous wreath motif, lid with two handles and central knob attached to bowl by means of pottery loop and decorated with buff-coloured slip and wreath motif.
Bibliographic references: Hayes 1997 / Handbook of Mediterranean Roman pottery (pl.IV)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Mrs Essie Winifred Newberry
